document_data.name: Arron
document_data.mainbody: '''Arron''' was a merchant who lived with the [[druid]]s of the [[Emerald Grove]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: While he was a businessman and a merchant, Arron was a rather caring individual.
document_data.Possessions: Among the various goods Arron had for sale were an ''[[amulet of elemental torment]]'' as well as the ''[[Rain Dancer]]'' [[quarterstaff]], and the ''[[Dragon's Grasp]]'' [[handaxe]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}},  the threat of [[goblin]] attacks threatened the residents of the Emerald Grove. Arron was of the opinion that the [[tiefling]] community they harbored should not be outcast into the wild, left to fend for themselves.
